ygData.subject: Sonorous Clounding
ygData.msgSnippet: I m waiting for on official acknowledgement and response from GZ (generally speaking, I have not personally sent him anything) regarding the Sonorous Clouding
ygData.messageBody:
I'm waiting for on official acknowledgement and response from GZ (generally
speaking, I have not personally sent him anything) regarding the Sonorous
Clouding issue. GZ says it allows you to see party member but it does not.

If anyone comes across this admission of guilt please post it to the list.
I was truly amazed that the bard weapon proc'ing bug from the last patch was
addressed so quickly...this is unusual treatment for bards based on the
track record.

Since the post-Christmas server overcrowding and the last few weeks worth of
buggy side affects in patches that have adversely affected bards, I have
somewhat shelved Faras and started up secondaries to take a break from the
dirge to 50 and enjoy being a newbie again. Let me tell you, when lguk has
90 people in it and you stand at the zone shouting for a group for an hour
it is refreshing to log a level 5 troll shaman into innothule and get 2
levels in two hours.

Faras (waiting patiently for Verant to stop breaking my bard)
